name: Pytetst/Selenium Assignment - Interviewer
onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget gnupg ca-certificates && wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/google-linux-signing-keyring.gpg && echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/google-linux-signing-keyring.gpg] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable && pip install -r requirements.txt
postCreateCommand: echo 'Ready for Python Pytest testing with Selenium + Chrome!' && python3 --version && google-chrome --version
